encodingDesc.p: The file data/letters/1880-9/1888/88-07-00a-final.doc was converted from Microsoft Word format into TEI using an XProc pipeline.

head.supplied: ¶ [By letter from Baron Mueller I learn that the Geographical Society have placed my name on their list of Hon Corresponding Members. ... The Baron has asked me to contribute a paper at the next meet...

div.p:
Text extracted from a letter from Tietkens to Alexander Macdonald, 17 July 1888 (A38, letter book, Royal Geographical Society of Australasia (Victorian Branch), Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney). See also W. Tietkens to M, 12 July 1888.
[By letter from Baron Mueller I learn that the Geographical Society have placed my name on their list of Hon Corresponding Members. ... The Baron has asked me to contribute a paper at the next meeting which takes place he tells me towards the end of this month.]
